com.codemelon.graph.graph

Interface WeightedEdgeGraph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectedWeightedEdgeGraph, KruskalGraph, UndirectedWeightedEdgeGraph

    public interface WeightedEdgeGraph

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_WEIGHT_EPSILON
      Default value for the epsilon below which weights are to be considered equal.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areEqualWeights(double w1, double w2)
      Determine if 2 floating point weights are to be considered equal in the given graph.
      double getWeightEpsilon()
      Retrieve the epsilon used to determine weight equality in the given graph.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_WEIGHT_EPSILON

        static final double DEFAULT_WEIGHT_EPSILON
        Default value for the epsilon below which weights are to be considered equal.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • areEqualWeights

        boolean areEqualWeights(double w1,
                      double w2)
        Determine if 2 floating point weights are to be considered equal in the given graph.
        Parameters:
        w1 - one of the weights to be tested for equality
        w2 - the other weight to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the absolute value of the difference between the 2 weights is below the a threshold

      • getWeightEpsilon

        double getWeightEpsilon()
        Retrieve the epsilon used to determine weight equality in the given graph.
        Returns:
        the epsilon used to determine weight equality in the given graph
